summary: A little something I made for modders to use/ mess around with.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is for anyone to use, it is a mock up template boss design of Boethiah the Daedric Prince, you can add her to your personal mods/ improve her, etc.
She is pretty tough, you may or may not win to her. LOL!

To spawn her you will need to use console command and look up Daedric Prince Boethiah, then you can add her code and vola!
she spawns and you get to fight her. :D

The first to fight her was Plague Hush, she was defeated, however I buffed her so she should be hard enough, kick her ass if you want!

In case anyone was wondering, if you see her summoning random minions, those are the shadows of all the NPC's that have been involved in sum sort of plotting/ deception, they were added for a reason + for the fun of challenge other than her running around and chopping people with her axe, I'd apply hungers but I don't own such content soo that's out of the window...

This is my first released mod sooo yea, I'm still a nub at modding but yea. XD

[b]Requirments:

[/b]- Dawnguard
- Dragonborn

[b]Permission:

[/b]If you use this for your mods; be sure to credit me. :P
author: Cryous7
